  </script>
  <script name="Bottom" DoNotReplaceCondition="&lt;!-- No ClickTale --&gt;" InsertBefore="&lt;!-- ClickTale Bottom part Here --&gt;|&lt;/body&gt;">
    <![CDATA[ %s ]]>
  </script>
</scripts>
